snippet: Twenty years after blocking the coffee chain from moving in, Katonah, N.Y., is facing what it views as a new threat to its character: a large CVS pharmacy.
abstract: Many residents and business owners in hamlet of Katonah, NY, are opposing plans for large CVS Health store, fearing its arrival will force closing of Katonah's one independent drug store and local shops selling many of the items CVS would offer; opponents have collected petition signatures and local Town Board may vote on zoning amendment that would reduce scale of any new stores in downtown area.
lead_paragraph: Twenty years after blocking the coffee chain from moving in, Katonah, N.Y., is facing what it views as a new threat to its character: a large CVS pharmacy.

headline.main: Town That Chased Away Starbucks Sees Its Identity Being Endangered Again
headline.print_headline: A Small Town Sees Risks in Plans for a Chain Store
